mappings.findingTitle: 1.5 Ensure MFA is enabled for the root user account
2.1 Ensure CloudTrail is enabled in all regions
2.6 Ensure S3 bucket access logging on CloudTrail bucket
4.1 Ensure no security groups allow ingress to port 22
4.2 Ensure no security groups allow ingress to port 3389
RDS.3 RDS instances should have encryption at rest
IAM.4 IAM root user access key should not exist
S3.1 S3 Block Public Access should be enabled
Lambda.1 Lambda function policies should prohibit public access
